Welcome to dialr!

```{r}
library(dialr)
library(dplyr)

x <- tibble(id = 1:4,
            phone1 = c(0, 0123, "0404753123", "61410123817"),
            phone2 = c("0393881234", 1234, "+12015550123", 0),
            country = c("AU", "AU", "AU", "AU"))

x %>% mutate_at(vars(matches("^phone")), ~phone(., country))
```
